text: @realDonaldTrump "Stocks plunge after DJT coronavirus speech spooks investors. U.S. stocks plummeted at opening Thursday after POTUS  speech Wednesday night failed to calm investors fears about the coronavirus. The Dow Jones Industrial average dropped 7.43%, for loss of 1,749 points, at opening"
